title: Thomas F. Coleman
summary: Thomas F. Coleman is a Canadian mathematician and computer scientist who is a Professor in the Department of Combinatorics and Optimization at the University of Waterloo,[1] where he holds the Ophelia Lazaridis University Research Chair. In addition, Coleman is the director of WatRISQ,[2] an institute composed of quantitative and computational finance researchers spanning several Faculties at the University of Waterloo.
